item.title: S3 Static Website Hosting
item.description: Related Notes S3 S3 Static Website Hosting Normally, you’d use AWS S3 APIs to access S3 However, when S3 Static Website Hosting is enabled, you can access S3 via standard HTTP This allows you to host almost anything When enabling, you must set an Index (default page) and Error (default, when something goes wrong) HTML document When enabled, a Website Endpoint is created.
